languages.text: "Тридцать четыре. Раньше их было больше, но некоторые сгинули во тьме веков. Великая утрата для Кровавой паутины".
"Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."
languages.original_text: "Тридцать четыре. Раньше их было больше, но некоторые сгинули во тьме веков. Великая утрата для Кровавой паутины".

traits.locale_text: "Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some perished in the abyss of ages. A terrible loss for the Bloodspun Web."
"Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some perished in the abyss of ages. A terrible loss for the Bloodspun Web."
"Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."
"Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."
"Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."
"Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."

languages.text: «Treinta y cuatro. Antes había más, pero algunas han perecido en la oscuridad del tiempo. Su pérdida supone una terrible tragedia para la Red Sanguinolenta».
languages.original_text: "Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: «Treinta y cuatro. Antes había más, pero algunas han perecido en la oscuridad del tiempo. Su pérdida supone una terrible tragedia para la Red Sanguinolenta».

languages.text: 「34人よ。以前はもっといたけれど、数人は時の闇の中で死んでいった。彼らを失ったのは、ブラッドスパン・ウェブにとっての大きな悲劇よ」
languages.original_text: "Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: 「34人よ。以前はもっといたけれど、数人は時の闇の中で死んでいった。彼らを失ったのは、ブラッドスパン・ウェブにとっての大きな悲劇よ」

languages.text: “一共有三十四张。原本的圣牌不只有这些，但部分圣牌在黑暗的时间长河中散佚了。它们的消逝对织血罗网而言，是个巨大的悲剧。”
languages.original_text: "Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: “一共有三十四张。原本的圣牌不只有这些，但部分圣牌在黑暗的时间长河中散佚了。它们的消逝对织血罗网而言，是个巨大的悲剧。”

languages.text: "Vierunddreißig. Früher waren es mehr, aber einige sind in der Dunkelheit der Zeit untergegangen. Ihr Verlust ist eine große Tragödie für das Blutgesponnene Netz."
languages.original_text: "Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: "Vierunddreißig. Früher waren es mehr, aber einige sind in der Dunkelheit der Zeit untergegangen. Ihr Verlust ist eine große Tragödie für das Blutgesponnene Netz."

languages.text: « Trente-quatre. Fut un temps où elles étaient plus nombreuses, mais certaines ont succombé aux ténèbres du temps. Leur perte est une immense tragédie pour la Toile de Sang. »
languages.original_text: "Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."

traits.locale_text: « Trente-quatre. Fut un temps où elles étaient plus nombreuses, mais certaines ont succombé aux ténèbres du temps. Leur perte est une immense tragédie pour la Toile de Sang. »

languages.original_text: "Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."

languages.text: "Otuz dört. Eskiden daha fazla vardı ama zamanın karanlığında bazılarını yitirdik. Bu kayıplar, Kanipi Ağı'nın büyük trajedisidir."
languages.original_text: "Thirty-four. There used to be more, but some have perished in the darkness of time. Their loss is a great tragedy for the Bloodspun Web."
